name: Winter Blues
description:
A small game where you must find 30 Gems in a snow storm within 10 minutes before you freeze.

Based upon the Theme: OUT OF TIME

Made using the following unity assets on 6/26/2022 within 14 hours:

Drag/Drop Pause Menu by Cinopt Studios

 Rock & Boulders by Manufactura K4

Cartoon Kid, Boy by Jose (Dogzerx) Díaz

Invector Meleee by Invector

Collect Me 8 by GameDev.Sale 

Closing Credits by William J

Easy Main Menu Free by Walled City Infotech

Storm Effects by Mythos Labs

Easy Unity 3D Timer By Jeff 'PsychicParrot' Murray

Music's used

Winter Chill

Winter Chill (Underscore Version)

By Composer Squad
